intro: Lomatium minimum, commonly known as small lomatium, is a species of flowering plant in the family Apiaceae. It is native to the western United States, particularly found in dry, rocky habitats. The plant has finely divided, fern-like leaves and produces small, yellowish-green flowers in clusters. It is often used in traditional herbal medicine for its purported health benefits. Lomatium minimum is also valued for its ornamental appeal in gardens due to its delicate appearance.
